entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
